children.text: A powerful combination of FILLMED’s NCTF mesotherapy for fine lines and dark circles around the eye area, together with lymphatic drainage massage, FILLMED’s Skin Perfusion Eye Recover Mask and a Dermalux treatment to finish addresses puffiness, dark circles, fine lines and wrinkles, and helps to lift the eyelid, hydrate the eye area and restore radiance.
Mesohyal offers the most extensive range of mesotherapy solutions.

During a mesotherapy treatment micro-injections of mesotherapy solutions are injected into the skin to correct multiple concerns, such as wrinkles, photoaging of the skin, dehydration, flaccidity, hair loss/thinning, among others.
The action of the needle triggers a physical reaction, stimulating tissue repair and regeneration. The solutions contain a variety of substances aiding rapair, regeneration and hydration.

Designed for those with crepey skin and pigmentation. ARC is an anti-ageing mesotherapy treatment which counteracts free radical damage and delivers intense revitalisation, hydration and rejuvenation.
Appropriate for the face, neck and décolleté.
3/4 treatments every 14 days are recommended.  Results will be visible within 30 days. Maintenance treatments every 6 months are advised.

Lumi Eyes is a polynucleotide-based mesotherapy treatment that repairs damage to the dermis. Improving the appearance of dark circles, deeply moisturising and fighting fine wrinkles, as well as smoothing and rejuvenating the skin under the eyes.
For best results, it is recommended to perform a series of 3 treatments with an interval of 4 weeks and repeat the treatment twice a year.

Eye Brightening Mesotherapy is an innovative treatment designed for rejuvenating the eyes to improve skin firmness, microcirculation, puffiness, and dark circles.

Combining a unique blend of hyaluronic acid, vitamin c, cucumber, chamomile, holly, rosemary, and antioxidants, it leaves the eyes looking brighter and the surrounding skin firmer, smoother, and rejuvenated.
Brands often used include Infini, Mesoestetic, Lumi Eyes, or Light Eyes and will be selection will depend on your needs.

Puffiness, swelling and bags around the eyes
Dark circles under the eyes
Superficial wrinkles and dry skin associated with premature ageing
Loss of skin elasticity

treatments.name: Stem Cell Microneedling for Hair Regrowth

children.text: Stem Cell Microneedling is used to help activate stem cells in hair follicles, which can lead to hair growth, in addition to collagen formation in the skin.

treatments.name: Trico Genetic Test for Hair Loss

children.text: INDIBA HairWave therapy increases tissue temperature and cell activity, stimulating and oxygenating the tissue from the inside, thus promoting blood flow.
The improvement of this flow favours the arrival of necessary nutrients so that the cells at the base of the hair follicle multiply and replicate, thus forming the hair.
Bio Gel filler can be used to augment fine lines and wrinkles as well as give definition to different areas of the face.
Blood is taken from the arm, centrifuged and the PRP (platelet rich plasma) is extracted and heated to form the bio gel.
The treatment achieves bio-stimulation, where stem cells and growth factors produce collagen.
3-4 sessions, every 4 weeks are recommended.  Results can last 2-3 years.

Ellansé works differently from traditional fillers. It gives an immediate correction of lost volume, just like a traditional dermal filler. But it also acts as a biostimulator, continuing to produce long-lasting and natural results by enhancing the body’s own natural collagen reserves.
It is made of polycaprolactone (PCL), which is a well known medical polymer that has also been used for many years safely in medical implants and other devices.
Unlike hyaluronic-based fillers, it cannot be dissolved.

Polynucleotides are a bioremodelling agent made of short polynucleotide chains – simplified DNA fractions.  When injected in minute amounts into the skin, they promote regenerative changes at a cellular level.
They work by increasing cell turnover, improving skin elasticity and reducing signs of hyperpigmentation.

children.text: Please contact the clinic before booking to ensure the device is available on the day.

The OBSERV Skin Analysis device is unlike anything else on the market today.  Many skin conditions that surface in time originate from deeper skin layers and are difficult to diagnose with the human eye.

The OBSERV exposes these skin conditions by using a patented skin fluorescence and polarised light illumination technology.  Using this unique technology, you can instantly reveal skin conditions, helping us diagnose and propose treatment plans to target any skin concerns that appear on the scan.

Our Skin Analysis consultations are a one-of-a-kind day where you wil receive a full skin analysis usign this world leading device.  We will have a detailed look at your skin, both on the surfae and underneath, to examine how healthy it truly is.

PRP is a highly concentrated mixture of platelets and growth factors taken from a small sample of your own blood. The PRP is injected into your skin.  PRP stimulates collagen, elastin and cellular growth, improves the blood supply to the tissues and improves hydration, leading to younger-looking skin.

PRF (Platelet-rich fibrin) involves taking a sample of your own blood, separating the blood into it's component parts and injecting the "liquid gold" part of the blood into the area to be treated.
PRF typically has a higher concentration of platelets, fibrin, and white blood cells than typically found in PRP treatments.
PRF promotes better healing, stimulating collagen, elastin and cellular growth, improving the blood supply to the tissues and improves hydration, leading to younger-looking skin.

Peel

The first step of the treatment involves the application of the Global Eyecon Periocular Peeling solution. This is a very specific peel for the eye area that combines powerful global anti-aging, anti-fatigue and depigmentation products.

Microneedling
The Global Eyecon periocular solution is applied to the eye area. This formula combines ingredients for a depigmenting and decongesting action, which improves microcirculation.
